alert.note: Alert for Gila; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 21 at 5:28PM MST until July 21 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE BACKBONE FIRE SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GILA AND YAVAPAI COUNTIES... At 526 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain has ended over the Backbone Fire scar. However, between 1 to 2 inches of rain have already fallen and runoff is expected to cause flash flooding along Sally May wash and Fossil Creek. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding in and around the Backbone Fire scar. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Backbone Fire scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sally May wash and Fossil Creek. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Sally May Wash and Fossil Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Get to higher ground immediately and stay away from Fossil Creek! Flash flood waters and debris will inundate swimming holes and recreation trails crossing washes within and downstream of the Backbone Fire scar.
